channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: Complete - Rescue ; INC#1660; 09:00PM; 701 E New Dock St; MAP: https://bit.ly/47cZkg9; #SanPedro; The adult male stranded inside the compact elevator of a dockside crane approximately 60' above ground, proved to be an elevator mechanic working on the system - and not the crane operator. LAFD responders, including those specially trained, certified and equipped to perform specialized urban search and rescue, climbed the exterior of the rain-drenched crane to a location between levels (i.e. elevator landings), where they stabilized the elevator and forced open the elevator doors. The stranded worker was medically assessed inside the small elevator (to confirm no illness or injury), before being placed into a rope and harness system to be lowered outside the elevator shaft to the next landing. He was then removed from the harness and walked down an auxiliary stairwell with firefighter assistance to ground level. He has declined any further medical care or transportation. ; FS 40; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC13 BC6 BT17 BT2 BT3 E238 E285 E40 E49 E5 E85 EM11 HR3 RA27 RA36 RA827 RA85 T38 T85 UR5 UR85 UR88; CH7; 12; Brian Humphrey

Rescue; INC#1680; 08:05PM; 13524 W Mulholland Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/4auk3yV; #BeverlyCrest; PRELIM: Solo vehicle left the roadway and went down a steep hillside. All three vehicle occupants had exited the vehicle and were found uninjured on LAFD arrival. Terrain made slippery by recent rain will require LAFD crews to use a rope system with a basket stretcher to individually hoist the trio an unspecified distance to the roadway above. #LATraffic: In order to perform the rescue safely, Mulholland Drive will be closed in both directions between Sumatra Drive and Beverly Ranch Road until LAFD operations are complete. Unknown duration. Motorists: expect congestion and delay, avoid the immediate area and consider an alternate route. LAPD Incident #4024.; FS 99; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 5; AO1 AO2 BC10 BC14 E278 E288 E289 E88 E99 EM14 H3 H4 HA3 HA4 RA88 RA99 RH114 T78 T88 T89 UR89; CH8; 17; Brian Humphrey

Rescue; INC#1660; 07:49PM; 701 E New Dock St; MAP: https://bit.ly/47cZkg9; #SanPedro; LAFD ground crews assisting one crane operator stranded in the elevator of a dockside crane approximately 60' above ground. The crane operator is In no medical distress. Plan A is for Firefighters to climb to the location and physically open the elevator doors. Plan B is to use a high-lift (cherry picker style) forklift to gain access to the hatch atop the elevator. ; FS 40; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC13 BC6 BT17 BT2 BT3 E238 E285 E40 E49 E5 E85 EM11 HR3 RA27 RA36 RA827 RA85 T38 T85 UR5 UR85 UR88; CH7; 12; Brian Humphrey

Traffic Collision with Entrapment; INC#1328; 04:34PM; 21400 W Califa St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3RxetmJ; #WoodlandHills; PRELIM: Solo vehicle into a tree with one person trapped. #LATraffic: Closure of southbound lanes of Canoga Avenue at Califa Street until LAFD operations are complete, unknown duration. Motorists, expect congestion and delay, avoid the immediate area and consider an alternate route. Detours are readily available. Monitor traffic reports on news radio. Media Inquiries: LAPD Valley Traffic Division (Incident #3250). ; FS 84; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 3; BC17 E305 E72 E73 E84 EM17 HR3 RA104 RA84 T105 UR88; CH8; 17; Brian Humphrey

Flooding; INC#1206; 03:11PM; 6800 N Hazeltine Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3NBYUcu; #VanNuys; PRELIM: Apparently ruptured underground water pipeline causing street pavement and soil damage near the intersection of Hazeltine Avenue and Vanowen Street. No injury. No evacuation. No structure threat. LADWP notified and en route to investigate / manage. Unknown ETA. Motorists, expect congestion and delay, avoid the immediate area and consider an alternate route. Detours are readily available. Media Inquiries: LADWP.; FS 39; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; E239 T39; CH8; Brian Humphrey

Traffic - FATALITY; INC#1600; 08:55PM; 13201 W Roscoe Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3v4GGKg; Sun Valley; Multi-vehicle collision with one fatality (age/gender unknown) and four patients with minor injuries. LAPD Inc# 3772; FS 89; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC14 E102 E239 E289 E290 E39 E89 EM14 RA39 RA89 T39 T89 T90; CH8; 17; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0405; 06:58AM; 12321 W Riverside Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/3TrpAAg; Valley Village; KNOCKDOWN: 48 firefighters extinguished the attic fire in 23 minutes. The fire was contained to the attic in one corner of the building. Salvage operations were conducted in the units below to protect against water damage. No further details.; FS 78; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC10 BC14 CM40 CM42 E102 E260 E278 E288 E289 E60 E86 E89 E97 EM14 RA60 RA78 RA878 SO1 T60 T78 T88 T89; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0405; 06:35AM; 12321 W Riverside Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/3TrpAAg; Valley Village; 4 story apartment building (3 residential over parking) with an attic fire in one corner of the building. One patient being assessed for possible smoke inhalation. Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 78; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC10 BC14 E102 E260 E278 E288 E289 E60 E86 E89 E97 RA78 RA878 T60 T78 T88 T89; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1281; 04:32PM; 1647 W 80th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/48lIE7q; Manchester Square; KNOCKDOWN: 44 firefighters extinguished the fire in 11 minutes. They contained the fire to the unit of origin. LAFD Arson investigator being attached for possible suspect on scene. One patient being assessed (approx 30yo F) with burn injuries. No further details.; FS 57; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC11 BC13 BC17 E21 E233 E264 E266 E38 E57 E61 E66 RA57 RA846 T33 T64 T66; CH9; 14; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1281; 04:21PM; 1647 W 80th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/48lIE7q; Manchester Square; Two story apartment building with smoke showing from one unit on the 2nd floor. Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 57; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC11 BC13 BC17 E21 E264 E266 E38 E57 E61 E66 RA57 RA846 T64 T66; CH9; 14; Margaret Stewart
